intro:
Three games in one! Volume up!
A compilation of Super Baby LUNLUN's action
! A super bargain edition!
description:
There are three games included!

◆Gigant Mom Buster
Your favorite Marma has grown huge and is rampaging!
Hit him with poo and get your normal Marma back! There's also a naughty option!
Easy-to-use, exhilarating action!

◆LUNLUN Poop Break
Break the oncoming horde of poo with a bullet!
Refresh yourself with a special finishing move!
A fast-paced action shooting game!

◆LUNLUN Super Hero Babys DX
The great adventure of LUNLUN, the super baby, who was eaten by the gigantic “Boss Poop”!
A side-scrolling action game with easy controls that won't result in a game over!

*Differences from the single-item version
・The stage composition has been partially changed.
・The strength of the bosses has been changed.
・A skip button has been added for the ending, etc.
・The amount of recovery from recovery items during boss battles has increased.
・Also, various other things.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
